Get Started Today

Beginning I had was harder

Ever since, I’ve been enjoying my work

"Quote" Unquote

Hell is empty and all the devils are here. --William Shakespeare

Never Tell people How To Do things. Tell them What To Do and they will surprise you with their ingenuity. --George S. Patton

Here’s how I got started…

It was 2013 summer, I was having an argument with my friend Alex about making money online. By the way, I am using an alias of my friend's name. Actually, he was making some web money by that time. "Dude, why don't you start learning programming?" he asked me. "Bro, programming is not my thing. I love maths and I want to be math teacher.", I paused and added "Programming is nothing but taking others code and manipulate it".

"Oye, Stop lecturing", He interrupted me and said "Believe me, Only way of mastering in programming is to read others code. You can trust me on that". Continue… "Ok, I will let you know, whether I trust you or not", I replied and changed the topic of our chatting. I couldn't noticed, 'that change' was flowing in my mind until 2015 winter. Yes, I buried my dream of acheiving PhD in methametics and started journey of being a code manipulator. React Projects

Weather Forecast

Download our app and we’ll send you a notice if it’s about to rain in the next 20 minutes around your current location. A good rain can be refreshing, but sometimes you just want to stay dry.

Searching Youtube video

We’ve scoured the entire planet for the best retreats and beautiful vistas. If there’s a corner of the world you want to escape to we know the most scenic and inspiring locations.

Post in your blog

We only send you on trips to places we can personally vouch for as being amazing. Which means we’ve mapped out where local wi-fi spots are and marked them in our app’s map view.

Keep track of your books

Everytime you book an escape with us we send you a survival kit with the finest materials. The kit will allow you to setup a tent, start a fire, scratch your own back and lower your taxes.
